# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is a book manual of **RKWard**. **RKWard** is an easy to use and easily extensible **IDE/GUI for R**.

The current and official documentation can be found here:

[Overview](https://rkward.kde.org/About.html)

[Screenshots](https://rkward.kde.org/Screenshots.html)

[User Documentation](https://rkward.kde.org/User_Documentation.html)

## Versions

The **RKWard** version used in this book is **0.7.5 - 24 Oct 2022**.

The **R Version** is **`r getRversion()`** (`r sessionInfo()[["running"]]` -  `r sessionInfo()[["platform"]]`)
